Class Header

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Header
public class Header
extends java.lang.Object

Header

DataAnalysisJava is a first version of a data analysis package for Java. The Header class handles data and operations related to the header information in the input data file.

Version:
0.1, 2003-April-8
Author:
Fionn Murtagh, fmurtagh@acm.org
